website_summaries.verdict: If you love the versatility of working out with dumbbells, this comprehensive set offers unbeatable convenience.
pros: Cast-iron construction is encased in rubber, resulting in better grip and floor protection, while the hexagonal shape prevents dumbbells from rolling
Pairs range from 5 to 25 pounds, making it ideal for multiple users or different strength-training requirements
cons: Takes up considerably more space than adjustable dumbbells, but increasing and decreasing weight is effortless

customer_reviews.title: The weights fit!
customer_reviews.text: These dumbbells are perfect for the price. Everyone's main complaint is that they don't fit on the rack, but they do. You just have to put a 5, 10, 15, 20, 25 on top and one on bottom instead of placing the same weights side by side. Ta-da!
customer_reviews.author: alyak

customer_reviews.title: Nice dumbbells that won't damage flooring
customer_reviews.text: Very nice dumbbells and the rack was super easy to assemble--I don't understand the reviews where people had trouble with this? Maybe just different luck. The rubberized coating on the ends of the dumbbells absorbs most of the shock if they are set down less-than-gingerly, which is probably to be expected when you're workin' up a sweat to Pitbull radio in your garage at midnight.
customer_reviews.author: K. McCarter

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this hesitantly after reading reviews saying the weights don't fit etc... As you can see... They fit fine. Ordered the 5 to 25 pound set and as shown in the first pic, I turned the bolts out which saved some room but I don't think I needed to. There is so much room left over. This is perfect in my home gym and I'm super pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: T.Fox

customer_reviews.title: great set delivered before scheduled time
customer_reviews.text: great set delivered before scheduled time. only draw back is the both five pound weights do not have space on rack whether a design flaw or oversight you have to put one weight on top of others if you are OCD do not get it will drive you crazy if you don't care and just want a nice weight set to exercise with this is a good set. they give you a tool to assemble which should take about 15-20 minutes to do. but my recommendation get a rachet set it will go quicker and ensure you tighten the bolts better.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Paquette

customer_reviews.title: Great product for life
customer_reviews.text: Value for your money. They arrived a week earlier than expected. I have been looking for weights for a while and it was going to cost more to buy them in pairs not to mention the additional money for the rack. The weights are awesome, they don’t smell bad at all (like the other reviewers reported) and as you can tell from my picture, they all fit in the weight rack. I assembled the rack by myself. It took me literally less that 30 minutes to put it together. All you need is wrench. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The weights are nice. But the weights are too close together when ...
customer_reviews.text: The weights are nice. But the weights are too close together when in the rack. You have to lift the weights out of the cradle and you are unable to do this since they are so close together - this is with the 10, 15, 20, 25, and 30 lb dumbbells. I'm not sure I got the right rack for the bigger weights.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is for the 5-50 lb rubber coated set with rack. The dumbbells are really nice, high quality. Rack is heavy duty, was easy to assemble, just beware it's 95" long. Very pleased over all. Was delivered early, well packed on a pallet, not damaged, everything there. Delivery via tractor trailer with lift gate. Nice guy, used a pallet jack to put it in my garage.
customer_reviews.author: Papeon

customer_reviews.title: Great weights and stand. Perfect for small home gym.
customer_reviews.text: Weights are the same CAP weights as they have at the gym. Contrary to other reviews, my rack easily holds all the weights. (The manufacturer may have listened to earlier reviews as my rack is slightly longer 28.5 inches rather than the 26 inches reported by others. Assembly was easy - a nut, a bolt and 2 washers at 8 different locations - wrench included. All as represented. Works great in my small workout room.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Shuley

customer_reviews.title: GREAT weight set!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect! Exactly what I was hoping for. Yes, they smell a bit like rubber (as they are coated in rubber), but for those who said the rack doesn't fit the weights....you must not have set it up properly. The weights fit in the rack perfectly for us! This was AS ADVERTISED and really a great addition to our home gym! AND it came a week early!!!! BUY THIS WEIGHT SET! Really best thing I have purchased in a while!
customer_reviews.author: GreasyLittleDog

customer_reviews.title: This Dumbbell set fits perfectly in my home gym. ...
customer_reviews.text: This Dumbbell set fits perfectly in my home gym. After opening the box, I wiped them down because most buyers complained of oily residue, but I know that is to keep them from rusting. As far as all the dumbbells not fitting on the rack, I just place the 5 lb er on top. No biggie! Most affordable set I could find to fit my budget. Bought for $183.
customer_reviews.author: Nellie

customer_reviews.title: Great product glad I have it. Better without pinch points
customer_reviews.text: Love the weights themselves they are exactly what I wanted. All weights fit perfectly on my rack smallest to largest. The only reason four instead of five is because the rack tracks used as guides to hold the weights on are a pinch pong for fingers when placing the weights back on the rack. Those guide rails usually only have one side which allows clearance for your hands but this has two sides making a narrow channel for your grip point.
customer_reviews.author: Summerville

customer_reviews.title: Best set for the price
customer_reviews.text: Just like everyone else said they did have a slight and I do mean slight rubber smell but that goes away in about 2 days or just use soap and water to clean them when you first get them and that smell is gone. The weights are great they were not chipped or damaged at all they came a day earlier then I expected, they are easy to grip and I'm sure will last a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: BJM

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased!
customer_reviews.text: The CAP barbell set with storage rack is a winner. I'm very pleased with the purchase. I bought the set because my gym, like every other gym, closed down. The price is reasonable and both the dumbbells as well as the rack are very sturdy and solid.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. T

customer_reviews.title: good product- easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed for my evening workout- good quality and stand is easy to assemble- row space perfect for one of each size
customer_reviews.author: consumer 4

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I was back and forth about purchasing dumbbells for my home during quarantine for covid-19 but I'm so glad I did! If you're on the fence and enjoy working out at least a few times a week, this is an absolute no-brainer, JUST DO IT! Shipped quickly yet in 2 deliveries I think b/c FedEx was overwhelmed. Nothing was damaged for me. Really been enjoying my home workouts.
customer_reviews.author: carolina

customer_reviews.title: Great, just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, arrived well packaged and quickly. Exactly what I needed for my small home gym. You CAN fit all weights in if you organize how I have in photo. I love the rubber hex, easier on floors and gives stability when using them to press down on.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: High quality but the stand is too small to fit all the weights. Stinky rubber.
customer_reviews.text: Nice set of weights, commercial grade, high quality. The stand is just ok. All of the weights don't fit, so as in the photo, the 5 lb set needs to be stored somewhere else. The rubber smells pretty bad too, maybe it will go away after time, but it stinks up my workout room.
customer_reviews.author: nikki

customer_reviews.title: Happy With The Product
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that it doesn't take much space. We went to several stores to buy these and every store was sold out of dumbbells, with back orders for months from China. We ordered these from Amazon and they arrived as promised..
customer_reviews.author: Beverly

customer_reviews.title: Best deal
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the dumbbells. Great to work out with. No more changing plates!!
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. Absolutely thrilled. Yay!
customer_reviews.text: All barbells fit on the rack easily and in multiple ways. The covering on the ends of the barbells is NOT Natural Rubber (latex); it's a different, (much better) product. The covering is extremely durable and fits the weights tightly as one would expect. The entire shipment arrived much sooner than expected and 100% intact. Both the weights and stand are the brand/product that I was expecting to arrive.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Reichert

customer_reviews.title: Make At-Home Gym A Reality
customer_reviews.text: These look every bit the part. Only thing worth noting is that they do let off a smell, but it subsides over time.
customer_reviews.author: dromatriptan

customer_reviews.title: Good set. There is a rubber smell
customer_reviews.text: Good set. There is a rubber smell.. but come on people.. it's GOING TO SMELL LIKE A TIRE for a little bit. This is because... shocker... it's rubber. The fact that they don't all fit is not a big deal for me. I just put the smallest two on the floor, underneath the large set. I don't use them for much anyway. I let the other resident in the house, that finds 5 pound weights to be effective, get practice in bending over to pick them up.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Weights in great condition, love them
customer_reviews.text: I had to assemble the rack, which one of the supporting bars was bent (straightened out once the bolt was cursedly fastened - which took more muscle than I had... hence the weights). Weights in great condition, love them!
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: Good, basic weight set
customer_reviews.text: Good, basic weight set. The rack took about ten minutes to assemble and came with all tools. The dumbbells have a curved handle and the coating seems durable
customer_reviews.author: Stef G

customer_reviews.title: Used merchandise in NEW packaging
customer_reviews.text: The weight set is nice, but as many other reviewers have stated the 5lb weight does not fit, furthermore the 15lb weights actually came used and were in a WalMart box. Really disappointed about that.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Sutphin

customer_reviews.title: Missing weights
customer_reviews.text: I was extremely excited about the item. However it arrived with a missing 25lb weight. I reached out to the seller and they didn’t make any attempt to fix the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, good price.
customer_reviews.text: Wanted the rubber-covered dumbells because I think they look nicer and less likely to scratch/mar the floor. Same quality as you see in the gyms. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: hcp22

customer_reviews.title: Nice dumbbell rack
customer_reviews.text: The rack showed up on time. The box was a little damaged and some of the holders were bent. I chalk that up to the delivery people. It was an easy fix and I was able to store my weights on it no problem. I would recommend this to anyone looking to save space in their home gym.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice weights
customer_reviews.text: Nice weights. The stand came with a nut that wouldn't thread. A quick trip to Lowe's fixed that, but it would've been nice if they'd have included an extra for situations like these. Weights are nice and feel good in your hands.
customer_reviews.author: Ted Persinger

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this however theres not enough space to place everything on the racks
customer_reviews.author: Johnnie Rush

customer_reviews.title: Decent product
customer_reviews.text: Like the quality of the dumbbells and rack, however they do not all fit on the rack without having to maneuver them into a certain position....not really thrilled with that....
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: A weight was missing
customer_reviews.text: I received my package today and a 20lb weight was missing. Tried to call the seller and got no answer. This set wasn’t cheap and I would like a solution to this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Nneka

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: nice product, bought the 200# for ocassional work outs in my garage, i love the grip and weights variety, recommended for a small garage gym. base is nice and sturdy easy to put together,
customer_reviews.author: Laura E. Garrison

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and well made
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set - your mailman will not like you as they come in separate packages, but perfect for a personal gym. Reverse the bolts and stack one weight of each size above and below on and they all fit nicely. Rubber smell goes away in a few days.
customer_reviews.author: Praire hunter

customer_reviews.title: Awesome price and purchase. In my hot humid Florida garage and its holding up well. Still looks new
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this over a year ago. It’s still going strong. It’s in the garage now. We live in Florida. Hot and humid and it still looks like new. At first, The smell is strong oil-chemically smell but it’s gone now.
customer_reviews.author: lisa

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Product! Pick this one!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome product and the seller went amazingly out of his/her way to make sure everything was perfect with this set. Great value and we LOVE this!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kakizaki H

customer_reviews.title: Nice.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy with great quality, with one exception. One of the holes was not cleaned properly after manufacturing. I had to use a smaller bolt than what came with the unit. Otherwise Good.
customer_reviews.author: Robert From NY

customer_reviews.title: Missing part
customer_reviews.text: We were unable to assemble the rack as it was missing a bolt. We wanted to complete assembly and didn’t want to wait for a replacement part so ended up going to the local hardware store to get a replacement bolt. Otherwise, the set was exactly what we were looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Aschoff

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up as well
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery, product as described. Easy set up as well.
customer_reviews.author: Sofia Aguayo

customer_reviews.title: Nice little setup
customer_reviews.text: Nice little setup. My only issue is this doe not hold all the dumbbells that come with it?! I can only fit one of the remaining pair of dumbbells. (Sorry 10 lb.’ers)
customer_reviews.author: Gregory A. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Not all weights fit on the bench at the same ...
customer_reviews.text: Not all weights fit on the bench at the same time well at least not in order. Still lovely weights, just don't leave on yoga mat overnight as it will leave a mark.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied with the product
customer_reviews.text: We have been using these for over 6 months and we are very happy with the purchase. The rack was easy to assemble and is holding up well. There was strong smell from the weights when we received it but that faded away overthe time. Overall a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: SJN

customer_reviews.title: Easy Assembly if Husband is Present
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for the $$. Assembly was a breeze; husband was speechless at how easy it was. Solid construction, comfortable grip. Glad I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Just want I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: My first full set of barbells. Just like being in the gym except it’s in my basement/pain cave. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Beldaran

customer_reviews.title: They feel and look pretty nice.
customer_reviews.text: Like the rest, weights smell and wished they fit better on the rack. As far as they go, wipe them down because they are packed in some sort of oil and deal with it.
customer_reviews.author: C.Griswold

customer_reviews.title: All the weights don't fit on the rack
customer_reviews.text: The weights and rack are great! The only problem is they don't all fit on the top shelf! I guess that's why they don't picture them on the rack in the photo. Other then that they are great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent affordable weights
customer_reviews.text: Weights are fine but it's odd that they didn't make the rack big enough to hold them all.
customer_reviews.author: linna

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality dumbells, solid stand. Now, do they provide people to cone over and make me use them more often?😊
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: There is a definite strong rubber smell...but this was expected! For the cost and what you get...this is an amazing product! It’s sturdy and the weights are of good quality!
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Elmore

customer_reviews.title: Good buy.
customer_reviews.text: The stand needs to be an inch wider to accommodate the weights without thought..other than that awesome set.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne Gaylord

customer_reviews.title: Great weight set for price
customer_reviews.text: Just like the ones in my gym but so easy to use at home. Best purchase I've made in a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Puterbaugh

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect starter set for an at home gym! Weights are great quality. Originally I was missing a 20lb weight, but once I contacted Cap barbell and provided proof of purchase they sent me the missing dumbbell. Great buy, worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: KA28

customer_reviews.title: Not a good buy right now...
customer_reviews.text: Good quality but I paid too much because COVID-19 SHORTAGES DRIVE PRICE
customer_reviews.author: william d jackson

customer_reviews.title: Defective and destroyed.
customer_reviews.text: Product was damaged. The five lb dumbbells were split in half at the top. Not good.
customer_reviews.author: Jon H

customer_reviews.title: Love love love!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! Same product as Rogue but much less expensive. Perfect for me!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Wright

customer_reviews.title: The rack is sturdy and holds the whole set if you stack the ...
customer_reviews.text: High quality rubber dummbells. The rack is sturdy and holds the whole set if you stack the 5s. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rack doesn't even for all weights it comes with.
customer_reviews.text: simple enough to put together, but the rack doesn't fit all the weights. smaller then i thought it would be. i would recommend spending a little more for a better product
customer_reviews.author: Charles S.

customer_reviews.title: Glad I invested in this purchase
customer_reviews.text: The set is perfect for me. Not too large and just the right weights that i can handle
customer_reviews.author: mpvazquez

customer_reviews.title: Shipmentwas wrong and missing items
customer_reviews.text: I recieved my rack but instead of a variety of dumbells I recieved six 5lbs dumbells and six 20lbs dumbells. Please help, I need the 10lbs,15lbs, and 25lbs dumbells
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: Stand not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Very hard to put bolts on, they stripped very easily. The dumbells do not all fit on the stand. Pretty disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: lizzylee

customer_reviews.title: They are nice quality weights
customer_reviews.text: They are nice quality weights. Like others report, there is a design flaw such that the rack does not hold all the weights. The 5 lb weights have to rest on the floor :( Otherwise a great set.
customer_reviews.author: paul

customer_reviews.title: The weights are nice, but they don't fit on the rack properly
customer_reviews.text: The weights are nice, but they don't fit on the rack properly. As another reviewer mentioned, they are too close together on the rack. The 10 and 15 lb weights actually touch. My set is 10lb to 30 lb. My wife's set of 2 lb to 10 lb weights came with the same rack. Those weights fit just fine.
customer_reviews.author: William J Baginski

customer_reviews.title: An OK purchase
customer_reviews.text: All weights don't fit on rack, you must stack a 5 pound dumbbell on all the others for all to fit on the rack
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Blackburn

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with this weight set! Would definitely recommend for those who miss the gym and want something comparable to what you would find there.
customer_reviews.author: John R Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer we service.
customer_reviews.text: A slight hiccup with one of the dumbbells but the seller corrected immediately! Excellent customer service. Will buy again from this seller. Thanks, nice quality set.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond P.

customer_reviews.title: ... all the weights but other than that they are great. The rubber coating is thick enough to keep ...
customer_reviews.text: Rack does not fit all the weights but other than that they are great. The rubber coating is thick enough to keep them quiet
customer_reviews.author: Godzilla

customer_reviews.title: One dumbell missing !!
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was pretty quick. Everything came in expect one of the 25lbs dumbells. Overall, I love the set. Just wish this dumbell could come in anytime soon!
customer_reviews.author: Martha G

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I need
customer_reviews.text: Got my order today and it’s perfect for what I need. They do have a very strong rubber smell, but I have them in my basement so not a big deal to me.
customer_reviews.author: BLynn2007

customer_reviews.title: The weights do not fit the stand.
customer_reviews.text: This would be a decent set of dumbbells if not for a major flaw. The weights DO NOT all fit properly on the rack. If you place them side-by-side in pairs there's no room for the 5 pounders. If you place one of each size on top and bottom as suggested in other reviews, the 5 pounders won't sit flat and instead rest on the adjacent weight. When you lift the other weight, the 5 pounders fall off the rack. Inconvenient, unstable, and unsafe.
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: Comes in 6 boxes so they are easy to move
customer_reviews.text: These dumbbells are great, they feel nice in my hands and having the rack to put them on is a plus, especially since it all was included with the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for home gyms
customer_reviews.text: This is a good Home gym set. I wish there was a step up to 30lbs
customer_reviews.author: Bret K Hutchison

customer_reviews.title: Great quality nice set
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and all came together at the same time. They need time to air out, the rubber is a little stinky.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Wing

customer_reviews.title: ... for a workout so this small set has been perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I have limited space for a workout so this small set has been perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Item defective
customer_reviews.text: The item is defective! Can’t put the rack together because the two side anchors are bent.
customer_reviews.author: Reshard

customer_reviews.title: Great set!!
customer_reviews.text: Everything is great! Just waiting on the 20 and 25 lb weights
customer_reviews.author: Fillmeinnikki

customer_reviews.title: The nuts and bolts don't screw in all the way ...
customer_reviews.text: The nuts and bolts don't screw in all the way so they are loose. Now I have to go buy new ones that fit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this little set up!
customer_reviews.text: These are good looking but they omit that "garage" smell, so I left them outside for a week to off gas before bringing them inside the house again.
customer_reviews.author: Selective Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like the different sizes of weights available in such a small set up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: For the price you pay it's really worth it. I read some comments where people complaining about the smell, there was some smell to it but if you leave it an open area for sometime it will be gone. Very easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: alex abraham

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this set. Rack was easy to assemble and was exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy you cant go wrong with this pruchase
customer_reviews.text: Great Buy , very good ones quality, i struggled to assemble the rack almost 1 hour , all weights are fitting well on the racks.
customer_reviews.author: DV

customer_reviews.title: The dumbbells them selves were fine. Most of the bolts needed to put the ...
customer_reviews.text: The dumbbells them selves were fine. Most of the bolts needed to put the rack together did not arrive. The bolts that did arrive were to long for the globe nuts to work properly. The rubber caps that are on the base do have a very strong odor.
customer_reviews.author: derek aune

customer_reviews.title: Excellent dumbbells with a smell
customer_reviews.text: I am really enjoying having my own dumbbells. I can use then anytime I want. The grips are excellent. The product is well designed. The only problem with them is the rubber coating has a moderate odor. I would not recommend these in your bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: R. Baker

customer_reviews.title: CAP Dumbell Set
customer_reviews.text: Great for home gym. Weights start at 10 lbs each and increase by 5 lbs. If you need more weight than 30 as I did you can buy the CAP weights individually. Very compact yet sturdy rack is easy to assemble. Like th weights better than the ones at the gym with plates. Steel handles are pro gym quality.
customer_reviews.author: wacairo

customer_reviews.title: All the weights can't be stored on the rack.
customer_reviews.text: The set arrived wrapped on a large pallet. The hex bells had a rubber smell for a few days which faded but I'm still waiting for the greasy feel to come off them (even though they've been wiped down several times). Also, after the rack was assembled, the smaller weights (5 pounders) don't even fit on the rack. However, it is pictured that way - I just didn't notice it.
customer_reviews.author: OhioWiseGal

customer_reviews.title: Great weight set
customer_reviews.text: This is a great weight set. The best part is that it comes with a stand which helps keep our weights organized and out of the way
customer_reviews.author: just peachy

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Everything about it is perfect except the rack it self is small
customer_reviews.author: Chandler

customer_reviews.title: Very Close to Commercial Grade Quality...
customer_reviews.text: I am a former personal training facility gym owner and this set of Dumbbells, rack and FREE shipping is a tremendous value. The cost of shipping dumbbells (free weights of any kind) is super expensive and a deterrent to buying them for most people looking to equip a home gym. It was for me until now. If I were to buy dumbbells for a commercial gym now having had first-hand experience with the quality and price of the CAP Dumbbells, I would buy these and save myself tons of money.
customer_reviews.author: Jana A.

customer_reviews.title: it's a nice set. A couple of weights came with rust ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price, it's a nice set. A couple of weights came with rust on the handle..
customer_reviews.author: Opie

customer_reviews.title: I would give it a 5, but the reasons ...
customer_reviews.text: I would give it a 5, but the reasons i gave it 4 stars is that the rubber odor is intense. It has been almost a month and odor is still there.
customer_reviews.author: Joe N.

customer_reviews.title: the dumbbells are great through.
customer_reviews.text: The rack is a little short in length, 1 dumbbell did not fit. the dumbbells are great through.
customer_reviews.author: Riley

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: No complaints. Exactly as advertised and arrived before the estimated delivery date. Will buy additional weights.
customer_reviews.author: Chad A.

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: The weights are exactly what you'd expect, and they were delivered in a timely manner. The stand is not very well made. It has some sharp corners, and is a little wobbly. Otherwise it would have gotten 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Nice enough but one 5 lb weight does not fit
customer_reviews.text: Nice weights and pretty sturdy stand. I'm kinda disappointed that the 5 lb weights don't fit. That's Right....YOU CAN FIT ONE OF THEM BUT THE OTHER YOU CAN'T. Pretty damn stupid. They could have make the whole stand two inches wider and all weights would fit. Edit:I'm not sure why you would want your pair of weights in different locations? Evidently if you put them in order 5-10-15-20-25 on the top and bottom they fit. That is not what the picture shows and that is not what I want. I want the matching pairs side by side and they don't fit that way. Still pretty damn stupid if you ask me.
customer_reviews.author: Rdiddy

customer_reviews.title: Clean design, compact stand, well-designed weights
customer_reviews.text: Have only had this set for about a week, but really enjoy having the set. It has a really clean look to it, and the stand is relatively compact for the number of weights it's holding. The weights shipped in flimsy cardboard that fell apart during the delivery, but none of the weights were damaged. (A couple did fall out while they were being delivered to our door, but were still okay). The stand had a smell the first couple of days (smelled to me like gasoline), but I let the parts off-gas outside. After that, they were fine. Have the whole set indoors now and haven't had any more strong smells.
customer_reviews.author: almostgerman

customer_reviews.title: Why weight?
customer_reviews.text: Have been looking for a starter weight set for some time and couldn't get past the sticker shock for the weight sets at our local athletic stores. When I saw this deal, I jumped at the price/shipping cost as nearly 25% less than the local equivalent. Overall very good quality and the rubber weights have held up well. I like the contoured grips as they fit my hands well. The stand is basic but very sturdy. It is a little awkward getting weights off the bottom rungs but better than grabbing them from the ground. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: HomeTheaterDad

customer_reviews.title: The stand was easy to install
customer_reviews.text: They're exactly what I expected. The stand was easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, but that's it.
customer_reviews.text: I ignored the warnings about the toxic phthalate and the overpowering smell, figuring those folks were whiners. Whoah, was I wrong. Spent half my saturday trying to get this nasty slimy, smelly oil off the weights, while being overpowered by the odor. And the room still stinks like the worst plastic you've ever smelled. Finding out it's toxic phthalate that I was breathing and probably absorbing into my skin has definitely given me a poor association with them weights and frankly makes me want to limit my time with them, which is of course the opposite of the point. But hey...they're cheap.
customer_reviews.author: C. Koberg

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: It was exactly what i expected. Definltey was a great buy. I would recocommend this product to anyone and everyone.
customer_reviews.author: SCOTT

customer_reviews.title: Awesome weights.
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the dumbbells is very good. The range 10-30 is good for my size, however I will need to pick up 40 and 50 lb dumbbells to do chest workouts. 30 lbs is not enough to do productive chest workouts, but the range is perfect for bi's, tri's, back, and legs. I like the space-saving design and I am sure that I will get many years of use out of this set. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan

product_meta.title: CAP Barbell Rubber Coated Dumbbell Set with Storage Rack
product_meta.description:
CAP's Rubber Coated Cast Iron Hex Dumbbells can be used for both the upper body and lower body to strengthen all muscle groups. The hexagon shape of these dumbbells are designed to prevent the dumbbells from rolling, as well as provide easier storage. Each dumbbell is coated in rubber to help protect floors and equipment. Made of solid cast iron w/steel handles. Set includes a pair of 5 to 25 pound, with Cap Barbell 20" two tier rack.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
CAP's Rubber Coated Cast Iron Hex Dumbbells can be used for both the upper body and lower body to strengthen all muscle groups. The hexagon shape of these dumbbells are designed to prevent the dumbbells from rolling, as well as provide easier storage. Each dumbbell is coated in rubber to help protect floors and equipment. Made of solid cast iron w/steel handles. Set includes a pair of 5 to 25 pound, with Cap Barbell 20" two tier rack.
feature_bullets: Item may ship in more than 1 box and may arrive separately
Set contains 5 to 25 pound dumbbells with 20 Inch rack for easy storage
Great for both upper and lower body strength
